data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: What is an activity you do for fun? How have you gotten better at this activity over time? Who do you enjoy doing this activity with, and how has it impacted your relationship?
data.answer: One activity that I do for fun is doing body surfing. I used to go to the beach every day in the summertime to practice my surfing skill and that’s how I got better at surfing. Although I would appreciate some company, most of the time I just went there by myself. Occasionally, my friends would join me and do surfing with me. But many of them do not prefer to go to a beach that is over crowed. They tend to go to less popular areas, such as Clovelly or Coogee, while I am, on the other hand, a true fan of Bondi beach. I just could not get enough of it. I love its vibe and I do not mind the crowd there. Therefore, the more times I went the better surfing skills I gained. In terms of relationships, if I have to be honest, I have to admit that my great surfing skill was one of the reasons why I got so popular among guys.
